description: Quad Canes by Hugo are everything you want in a cane and much more. These height adjustable, cocoa small base quad canes can accommodate most people between 5' - 6'.5" and are durable, versatile and stylish. The Hugo Quad Cane has a shock absorbing cushion-top handle with reflective strap for added night time safety. Hugo Small Base Quad Canes incorporate push buttons to provide 11 precision height settings, supporting up to 300 lbs. The ergonomic cane handle is designed to fit more comfortably in your hand while the K-shaped base provides greater stability and can be rotated for left or right hand use. Manufactured of heavy-gauge anodized aluminum to provide durability while being light weight. Model # 731-852
title: Hugo Mobility Adjustable Quad Cane for Right or Left Hand Use, Cocoa, Small Base
